title: IMS-LD-Based Computer-Based Learning (CBL) Design Tool Training

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental mathematics concepts and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to enhance competency in designing IMS-LD (IMS Learning Design)-compliant CBL (Case-Based Learning)

learning_goals: Learners can generate learning design documents compliant with IMS-LD standards
Learners can complete the CBL design process for mathematics subjects using the CourseEditor tool
Learners can develop learning design plans compatible with various LMS environments
Learners can perform CBL design without technical background through a user-friendly interface
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
